caption.center: Robert M. GUENTHNER, Appellant, v. Charles Nelson JONES and Joe E. Finn,

opinion.posture: Appeal from Bullitt Circuit Court; Charles R. Richardson, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Henry J. Burt, Jr., Louisville, for appellant.

opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion by Special Commissioner RICHARD A. REVELL, Affirming.[fn*]
